  • Field Details

    • fsm

      public FSMBehavior fsm
      Parent FSM.

    • log

      public Logger log
      Logger for the behavior to log messages to. This logger defaults to the same logger as the owning agent's logger.

  • Constructor Details

    • State

      public State(Object name)
      Creates a named state. The name may later be reassigned when the state is added to the FSM.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the state.

    • State

      public State(Object name, Runnable runnable)
      Creates a named state. The name may later be reassigned when the state is added to the FSM.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the state.
      runnable - Runnable to run.

  • Method Details

    • action

      public void action()
      This method is repeatedly called when the state is active. The default implementation simply blocks the behavior unless a runnable was provided during instantiation.

    • onEnter

      public void onEnter()
      This method is called when the state is entered.

    • onExit

      public void onExit()
      This method is called when the state is exited.

    • onEvent

      public void onEvent(Object event, Object eventInfo)
      This method is called when an event is triggered.
      Parameters:
      event - an object naming the event.
      eventInfo - an object providing extra information on the event.

    • getName

      public Object getName()
      Gets the name of the FSM state.
      Returns:
      name of the state.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the state.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      See Also:
      • Object.toString()

    • setNextState

      public void setNextState(Object name)
      Changes the FSM state to the specified state.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the state to change to.

    • terminate

      public void terminate()
      Terminates the FSM.

      Blocks the behavior.
